title: President Trump’s Historic Deregulation Is Benefitting All Americans – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Budget & Spending	

Issued on:
October 21, 2019
We are now reducing the size, scope, and cost of Federal regulations for the first time in decades, and we are already seeing the incredible results.
						President Donald J. Trump					HISTORIC DEREGULATION: Since taking office, President Donald J. Trump has led historic deregulation efforts to roll back red tape that burdened Americans and stifled economic growth.RESTORING FREEDOM AND TRANSPARENCY: The President is working to protect Americans from overregulation and administrative abuse. BENEFITTING ALL AMERICANS: President Trump’s deregulation efforts are offering real benefits in Americans’ daily lives.
